Package com.esri.mo2.ui.dlg

Several generic popup dialog boxes are defined here.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ModalPopUp This class implements a popup dialog that can be displayed in a separate thread in order to solve a problem with Applets running within Internet Explorer.
 

Class Summary
AboutBox This class implements a dialog that displays information about the product in which it is used.
FindDialog An user interface allows user to input a string to do a search on a given source JTextPane.
FontChooserUI This class allows you to determine the font type and color that is to be used in the dialog.
ImageExportDialog This Dialog outputs the currently displayed Map/Layout to an image file.
MapTipsUI This class implements a dialog that allows end-users to select/clear map tips for all FeatureLayers present in a map.
MessageBox Displays a modal popup Message Dialog in a separate Thread.
MessageDialog This class implements a dialog for displaying messages sent to the MessageCentre.
ModalPopUpLauncher Displays a modal popup Dialog in a separate thread.
QueryBuilderDialog This class implements a dialog that facilitates feature selection in a Map based upon attribute values.
RestrictedLogin This class implements a dialog used to authenticate access to an ArcIMS 3 MapService.
SimpleQueryBuilderDialog This class implements a simple QueryBuilder dialog.
ThreadDialog This class implements a dialog that displays thread usage.
 

Package com.esri.mo2.ui.dlg Description

Several generic popup dialog boxes are defined here.
